Ninsiima Ronah Rita (amụrụ na 31 Machị 1978) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye nta akụkọ Uganda bụ onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị nke ndị omeiwu maka Kabale District na 9th Parliament of Uganda

Ọ meriri onye bụbu minista ọrụ ugbo Hope Mwesigye onye nọchitere anya mpaghara ahụ kemgbe 1994 na ntuli aka 2011 Uganda na Febụwarị 18 wee dochie ya maka oche n'etiti afọ 2011 na 2016. Rita bụ onye na-azọ onwe ya mgbe Hope Mwesigye meriri National Resistance Movement (NRM).
A mụrụ Rita n'ezinụlọ nwere ọtụtụ nwanyị

Ọ gara O-level ya na Kigezi High School wee nweta diplọma na Business Management site na International Professions Academy na mpaghara Kabale na 1997. Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Kigezi Private Sector Promotion Centre ma mesịa na Voice of Kigezi redio na 2000 ebe ọ kwadoro mmemme a na-akpọ "Ruhondeza"

N'afọ 2005, Rita nwetara ọrụ dị ka onye na-akọ akụkọ na Radio West na Mbarara tupu ọ ghọọ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'afọ 2011. Rita tụfuru oche ahụ n'aka Catherina Ndamira Atwikiire maka onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị nke ụlọ omebe iwu maka mpaghara Kabale na ụlọ omebeiwu nke iri nke Uganda na 2016.
Mgbe ọ lanarịrị, a sịrị na Rita nyere Chineke ndụ ya.
